itemInfo.itemDesc: A mushroom that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Sky Mushroom
item.desc: A natural resource that can be used as an element for cooking, alchemy.\n - How to Obtain : Elric Shrine, from Sky Mushroom.\n ※ Direct use of this item will give you special buff but it might cause food poisoning at the same time!

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
